_PAGE_FILTER_SEARCH_HIGHLIGHT_ARGUMENTS_: Der Wert, in dem der Suchbegriff hervorgehoben werden soll
Der Suchbegriff, der im Wert hervorgehoben werden soll
Eine CSS-Klasse, die den hervorgehobenen Teil des Werts stylen soll

# Arguments:  
value (String): The value in which the search term should be highlighted.
[searchModel=""] (String): The search term to be highlighted in the value
[searchClass="a_search_highlight"] (String): A CSS class that should style the highlighted part of the value
_PAGE_FILTER_SEARCH_HIGHLIGHT_DESCRIPTIO: The function filterSearchHighlight is used to highlight a search term in a value by wrapping the search term with HTML tags. It allows customization of the search term and the CSS class for highlighting.
